title: Limits of animal models in study of human health

content.prompt: The risk that many cancer-causing chemicals pose to humans can be estimated using laboratory tests on rats. A significant scientific limitation of such tests is that

choices.label: they are banned in the United States
animal models may not reflect human responses
the test animals may be killed as a result of the tests
